channel.title: How to make quests (easy guide)
channel.description:
hello fello moparscapers, dont be afraid to reply, most people get stuck on this but i made it so you can have over billions of quests on your server!
first step...
[code] public voide quest()
quest id = 1 sendquest128 6133-6155 then } = true;
oh no!
a knight has gone missing from the castle!
task:
find out who the knight was
find out where he might have gone
task 1 completed = true sendframe 333
task 2:
you found out where the knight was
but he was badly injured by wolves in the mountains
get help!
taks 2 completed = true sendframe 333
task 3:
you have gathered the materials sir mavik told you too get
now make a sheltered prairy cart and bring the knight home
taske 3 completed = true sendframe 333
taks 4:
well done you have rescued the knight talk to hans at home for your reward
public void end quest 1()
} } } }
[/code]
well this is my simple quest :)
you need client for this so just make it so you build something else like a mine cart...
you must make the npc's give options and talk though...
so visit my other tutorials on how to learn that
this is from my approved 510/317 server
yes i fused them together not so easy....
well enjoy
-wolf scaper

item.title: How to make quests (easy guide)
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

Ok, so maybe you created some “Custom Language”…

  1. That doesn’t excuse you from trying to bypass rules by posting a incomplete TuT in the HELP section
  2. That doesn’t excuse “void”, a four letter word from being spelled wrong, regardless of it being a typo
  3. If it is custom, how will this help anyone else other then your ego?

I know this word is generally frowned upon, but…
failed

Read full topic
